plot: Digest of newsreel footage from various sources focuses exclusively on key Axis - especially Japanese - and Allied activity during the USA's first year of involvement in WWII.
title: The News Parade of the Year 1942
plot_es: Digest of newsreel footage from various sources focuses exclusively on key Axis - especially Japanese - and Allied activity during the USA's first year of involvement in WWII.
original_name: The News Parade of the Year 1942
plot_en: Digest of newsreel footage from various sources focuses exclusively on key Axis - especially Japanese - and Allied activity during the USA's first year of involvement in WWII.
